scene_target: Artie receives a cursed reward for his overkill and must flee an aggroed forest.
goal: Introduce the 'Participation Trophy' item and demonstrate the extreme vulnerability of Artie's 1 HP build when faced with a mob.
conflict: Artie's desire to rest versus the 'Beacon' effect of his new item attracting a horde of monsters.
end_condition: Artie is sprinting toward the distant town gates with a growing trail of monsters behind him.

statuses.effect: Massively increases aggro radius; monsters within 1km are aware of your location.
statuses.name: Monster Beacon

statuses.effect: Maximum aggro from all local entities.
statuses.name: Marked for Death

set.reason: Artie's stamina depleted during the sprint while the Participation Trophy activated the Monster Beacon and Marked for Death statuses.

persona_updates: Artie is discovering that his high-damage build comes with extreme social and physical aggro.

global_continuity_system_updates.reason: Aggro Meter mechanic introduced and activated.

inventory_alignment_updates.reason: Artie is holding the Participation Trophy while fleeing toward Oakhaven.

chapter_so_far_add: Artie's overkill victory resulted in a cursed trophy that makes him a permanent target for monsters.
key_events: Artie acquired the Participation Trophy (Cursed) in his left hand.
The System applied the 'Monster Beacon' and 'Marked for Death' statuses to Artie.
Artie's Aggro Meter reached 100%, triggering a zone-wide hunt.
Artie began a high-stakes sprint toward the gates of Oakhaven.
Artie's stamina dropped to 60/100 during the chase.
The System initiated the 'Run for Your Life!' quest.
last_scene: Artie received the cursed Participation Trophy after vaporizing the tutorial slime, which immediately broadcast his location to every monster in the forest.
Forced into a desperate sprint toward Oakhaven, Artie struggled with his 1 HP vulnerability as a horde of aggroed creatures closed in.
